name: otok (itch)
description:
otok

(name meaning Island in Croatian)

When you start the game gives you a 10x10 block island, and the colors of the Roofs, Water, Grass, and Trees, are randomly picked.   

Then you are given a random building which you can rotate and place where you choose.  After placing you will be given another building, to build a nice little pretty island.  The current build is the first version, which doesn't have a couple of things that I will add later, such as rotating around the island to be able to see the other sides.  And there are only a couple houses to place, along with some Trees, open tiles, some having boxes on them, and 1 column.  

More placeable things / buildings will be added very soon.

  • More trees
  • More random objects in the open areas
  • More builds, as well as building styles

The Game will only be free for about a week, from Jan 11th - 18th.

At a later time, the game will be $1, which will also be when I release it to iOS.
